summary: When people begin exploding from stress, George Washington Winsterhammerman tries to ignore the epidemic and live his usual life, but then he suffers his first symptom.
cast: Zach Galifianakis|Judy Greer|Mía Maestro|Missi Pyle|James Le Gros|D.W. Moffett|Matthew Glave|Chris Coppola|Fay Masterson|Ryan McCann|Anthony L. Fuller Jr.|Joe Rosati|Mycol Comolli|Angela Adto|Dale Bowers|Pat Cashman|Nancy De Mayo|Lowell Deo|Juba T. Drake|John Keister|Toan Le|Damon LeGarde|John LoPresti|Aubrey Morris|John Paulsen|Matt Thomas|Andrew Tribolini|Tanya Memme
title: Visioneers
